name: Hike Victoria Guide to over 60 Walks
categories: Hike Victoria Guide to over 60 Walks
description: Venture outside the city to get some fresh air around Victoria, BC. Follow the directions in this user-friendly guidebook to find vigorous hikes or pleasant walks nearby. Includes East Sooke Park, Gowlland Tod Provincial Park, Matheson Lake, Mount Wells Regional Park, Island View Beach, North Saanich neighbourhoods, and more. Maps, trail stats, highlights, and directions to the trailhead accompany the route descriptions.
